Subtask.1: ECS and AMG crew members perform PMCS on the vehicle per applicable TMs
Subtask.2: ECS crew members perform PMCS of the ECS and associated equipment per TM 9-1430-1600-10-1, other applicable TMs, and SOPs
Subtask.3: ECS crew members perform tactical weapon control computer unit diagnostics (TWUD)/baseline and fault recognition per TM 9-1430-1600-10-1
Subtask.4: ECS crew members perform lightweight computer unit (LCU) diagnostics and LCU initialization per TM 9-1430-1600-10-1
Subtask.5: AMG crew members perform AMG PMCS and associated equipment PMCS per TM 9-1430-603-10, TM 9-1430-1603-10, other applicable TMs, and SOPs
Subtask.6: EPP III crew members perform EPP III PMCS per TM 9-6115-757-13&P, TM 9-6115-668-13, and SOPs
Subtask.7: RS crew members perform PMCS on RS and associated equipment per TM 9-1430-1601-10-1, other applicable TMs, and SOPs
Subtask.8: LS, RS, and EPP III crew members perform PMCS on the HEMTT per applicable TM and SOPs
Subtask.9: LS and RS crew members perform PMCS on the M860A1 trailer per TM 9-2330-357-14&P and SOPs
Subtask.10: LS crew members perform LS PMCS and associated equipment PMCS per applicable TMs and SOPs
Subtask.11: LS crew members perform 15 kilowatt (KW) generator PMCS per TM 9-6115-643-10 and SOPs
Subtask.12: Missile reload crew members perform GMT PMCS per TM 9-2320-433-10 and SOPs
Subtask.13: BCP crew members perform PMCS on the BCP and associated equipment per applicable references and SOPs
Subtask.14: RSOP crew members perform PMCS of RSOP equipment per applicable TMs and SOPs
Subtask.15: Perform prepare for movement using drills 44-CW-D0011, 44-CW-D0012, 44-CWD0015, 44-CW-D0017, 44-CW-D0140, 44-CW-D0200, and 44-CW-D9002, applicable TSOP, and SOPs
Subtask.16: Perform emplacement per drills 44-CW-D0001, 44-CW-D0009, 44-CW-D0010, 44-CW-D0016, 44-CW-D0023, 44-CW-D0130, 44-CW-D0190, and 44-CW-D9003, applicable TSOP, and SOPs
Subtask.17: ECS crew members initialize the ECS per drill 44-CW-D0009; TM 9-1430-1600-10-1, applicable TSOP, and SOPs
Subtask.18: ECS, BCP, and LS crewmembers establish and operate the battery communications net per communications plan and applicable TMs
